column4: I need to make files on a machine with an ubuntu live cd available over the network to another computer. Without an internet connection, there seems to not be a SMB or FTP server on the live cd. Are there other options?
i guess you could install them? or you could use scp to copy. the other computer should have ssh-server running.
no internet connection, can't install them. other computer is windows, and i need to be able to browse/access files on the live cd machine from the windows machine
not even on the other computer?
